duoDataUse.description: This data use modifier indicates that use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations and not-for-profit use, non-commercial use.
duoDataUse.label: not for profit, non commercial use only

description: The purpose of this project is to provide public human datasets for the study of rare diseases. The use of public human genomic background combined with the in-silico insertion of real disease-causing variants enable a representative dataset for testing purposes without facing ethical and legal issues associated with the use of human sensitive data. This project aims to help develop technical implementations for rare disease data integration, analysis, discovery,  and federated access.
name: Rare Disease Synthetic Dataset
